resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103016</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Mystery Mud: Exploring Changes in States of Matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geheimnis-Schlamm: Erforschende Änderungen 
in den Zuständen des Stoffes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Boue de Mystère : Changements les explorant
des états de matière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lama Do Mistério: Mudanças explorando nos 
estados da matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fango Di Mistero: L'esplorazione dei 
cambiamenti dentro Dichiara della materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λάσπη μυστηρίου: Να ερευνήσει τις αλλαγές στα 
κράτη του θέματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fango Del Misterio: Cambios que exploran en 
estados de la materia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Join a group of middle-school students on a visit to a laboratory at the Massachusetts Institute of Technology, where they experiment with "mystery mud" and learn about the relationships between magnetism, particle motion, and changes in the state of matter.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbinden Sie eine Gruppe Mittlerschule 
Kursteilnehmer auf einem Besuch zu einem Labor beim Massachusetts 
Institute of Technology, in dem sie mit "Geheimnisschlamm" 
experimentieren und über die Verhältnisse zwischen Magnetismus, 
Partikelbewegung und Änderungen in der Tatsache erlernen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Joignez un groupe d'étudiants de moyen-école sur
une visite à un laboratoire chez le 
massachusetts.institute.of.technology, où ils expérimentent avec la 
"boue de mystère" et se renseignent sur les rapports entre le 
magnétisme, le mouvement de particules, et les changements de l'état
de choses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Junte um grupo de estudantes da médio-escola em 
uma visita a um laboratório no Instituto de Tecnología de 
Massachusetts, onde experimentam com do "a lama mistério" e aprendem 
sobre os relacionamentos entre o magnetismo, o movimento da 
partícula, e as mudanças no estado da matéria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unisca un gruppo degli allievi della 
centrale-scuola su una chiamata ad un laboratorio al Massachusetts 
Institute of Technology, in cui sperimentano con "il fango di mistero"
ed imparano circa i rapporti fra magnetismo, movimento della 
particella e cambiamenti nel dichiarare della materia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσχωρήστε σε μια ομάδα μέσος-σχολικών σπουδαστών σε
μια επίσκεψη σε ένα εργαστήριο στο ίδρυμα της Μασαχουσέτης 
τεχνολογίας, όπου πειραματίζονται με τη "λάσπη μυστηρίου" και 
μαθαίνουν για τις σχέσεις μεταξύ του μαγνητισμού, της κίνησης 
μορίων, και των αλλαγών στην κατάσταση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ensamble a grupo de estudiantes de la 
medio-escuela en una visita a un laboratorio en el Instituto de 
Tecnología de Massachusetts, en donde experimentan con "fango del 
misterio" y aprenden sobre los lazos entre el magnetismo, el 
movimiento de la partícula, y los cambios en las declaraciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
FN:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211213</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103016</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/mystery-mud-exploring-changes-in-states-of-matter</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
